issue.title: [Plasma] Several GPU-related APIs are used in places where errors cannot be appropriately handled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2888](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2888). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'm adding `DCHECK_OK` statements for ARROW-2883 to fix the unchecked Status warnings, but this code should be refactored so that these errors can bubble up properly

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2888?focusedCommentId=16687240) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Plasma CUDA support is as yet experimental, but it would be a good idea to fix these at some point
